name: ARIANNE
detail: Arianne is a mysterious singer (now identified as Arianne Schreiber) who performed the song written by Shiro Sagisu and Hideaki Anno, "Komm, Süsser Tod" in the anime movie of the year 1997 "The End Of Evangelion". She also sang versions of "The Time Warp", "Over At The Frankenstein Place" and "Science Fiction Double Feature" for the "Rocky Horror Show" point and click PC game. Nowadays she's member and leader of the bands called Smash The Box and iCON electrobox

works.name: NEON GENESIS EVANGELION 10TH ANNIVERSARY - DECADE / 新世纪福音战士原声音乐 十周年纪念CD [DECADE]
THE END OF EVANGELION ― 新世紀エヴァンゲリオン 劇場版 / 《新世纪福音战士剧场版：THE END OF EVANGELION》原声音乐
